response: narrative=Daniel Jones, who experienced a recent bereavement and disconnected utilities, left home. His friend spotted him later at the skate park.

narrative=Daniel, disconnected from support services and recently bereaved, fled his home on March Road, Buckie. After a family dispute involving domestic violence, his concerned grandmother alerted the police. He was eventually found safe near a highway.

narrative=Daniel Jones was last seen at his home on March Road, Buckie. His family, including his father Iain, became worried after Daniel, who has a noted disability, did not return home as expected. Initial assumptions suggested Daniel may have wandered towards Archiestown. Despite extensive searches, Daniel remained missing for several days. His absence prompted community-wide efforts to locate him. Eventually, Daniel was found by family members safe at an address on North Lane, Archiestown. It was determined that Daniel had become disoriented and unintentionally traveled to the location where he was ultimately traced.
